pageContext.claim: “Rep, Elijah Cummings has been a brutal bully, shouting and screaming at the great men & women of Border Patrol about conditions at the Southern Border, when actually his Baltimore district is FAR WORSE and more dangerous. His district is considered the Worst in the USA. As proven last week during a Congressional tour, the Border is clean, efficient & well run, just very crowded. Cumming District is a disgusting, rat and rodent infested mess. If he spent more time in Baltimore, maybe he could help clean up this very dangerous & filthy place.”
pageContext.analysis: Cummings's district includes rural and suburban parts of Baltimore and Howard counties, as well as parts of Baltimore city. These include some of the lowest crime and highest-income ZIP codes in the country.
